author: jmason
msg: added static-thresholds script used in recent tests

author: felicity
msg: trying to make mass-check less likely to blow up.  children are forked
pre-message loading, so they should take less memory.  support having
children die (via --restart #) after # of messages have been processed
to help deal with any memory leaks and the like.

author: jmason
msg: let's try this again.  another fix for FORGED_RCVD_TRAIL et al.   Also added T_FORGED_RCVD_IP_HELO which I noticed during testing

msg: added prelim support for GPG-signing to build/update_stable
